website_summaries.verdict: iPhone photographers should consider this moderately priced gimbal for its intuitive controls, buttery smooth object tracking, and two-way charging feature.
pros: Supports a wide range of modern smartphones
Responds to the most delicate of movement to preserve your shots
cons: Although this gimbal works perfectly with iPhones, many features are still missing for Android users

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for iPhone XS Max
customer_reviews.text: It is unable to balance iPhone XS Max. You can add some counterweight to temporarily "balance" an iPhone XS Max. However according to Zhiyun's customer service and Smooth 4's specification, the maximum payload of Smooth 4 is 210g, and an iPhone XS max weights 7.34 oz, which is 208g. Adding any counterweight will exceed the maximum payload. Zhiyun's customer service just told me, iPhone XS Max is not supported. Pity for me that I just learnt this after my return window :-(
customer_reviews.author: choice

customer_reviews.title: First gimbal, must say - LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first gimbal. I've never used one, let alone purchased one. So far I'm having fun getting used to it. I'll update the review. But it's really well made! Lots and lots of features (I'm still learning) packed into this thing. Great little case to carry it all in is included. It is a really great buy. I'm disabled, walk in a brace and have a limp, so keep that in mind when you see the video. I tried to make it as bumpy and jerky as I could. My arms and hands shake and have tremors and this really does a great job at getting rid of that.
customer_reviews.author: DJShopper

customer_reviews.title: Control on gimbal is NOT WORKING!!!
customer_reviews.text: Stablizer is working. But after doing all the process on manual and youtube tutorial as noted. In wasn’t able to control tue gimbal using my iPhone xs. Keypad on gimbal is not working. Im not sure if this is a hardware issue or app issue. Ive successfully connected my phone to the app but i can control the gimbal. After leaving a message to the support, they have notified me to return it and amazon will refund me. I will also post a video as fact thats its not working.
customer_reviews.author: Jonix

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy for android phones!!!
customer_reviews.text: I understand that "some" features do not work for android phones but the features that do work, do not work well at all. App crashes during filming causes the gimbal to go limp. I did get some smooth shots using the factory camera but wasn't consistent. Also the zoom in and out wheel was not smooth at all, looks horrible during playback. Overall, not having the ability to film in 4k with the app is ridiculous. The company keeps saying they're working on a deal with Samsung to allow 4k on their app but it's been several months since the release and no progress towards an improved app.
customer_reviews.author: Hiep

customer_reviews.title: everything about the Smooth 4 is just fantastic. It's easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Since, this is my first gimbal, I'm still playing with it, trying to get used to it, been only using it for a day. But man, everything about the Smooth 4 is just fantastic. It's easy to use, for beginners like myself, because of the control panel. The handwheel (very helpful) on the side can be use with zoom or focus. I don't have any bad thing(s) to say about this gimbal. However, my biggest concern is the app itself, since I'm an android user (LG G4). I'm not sure if the android app works well for other android users but hopefully they can fix the bug(s).
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: App Not Available
customer_reviews.text: Pulled this out of the box, scanned the app QR code, and it's unavailable on the Google Play store. Checked their FB support, and there are a bunch of unanswered posts regarding this. If you have an iPhone, still worth a shot but 100% useless with Android. Twelve plus day old posts going unanswered regarding this, while posts about other issues are receiving a response, so going to ship it back to Amazon. Build quality is great and this is a solid price for the feature set, but needs a disclaimer that it's not Android compatible.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Confusing and Combersome
customer_reviews.text: When I received it, I was all set to use it with my Note 8. Unfortunately, the android app is terrible, the Gimbal doesn't stay connected to my phone's bluetooth or connect automatically, the gimbal is difficult to stabilize, and for 3 days, I just haven't gotten it to work as advertised. I've already printed the return label and I'll be sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Chidi

customer_reviews.title: not working with iPhone 11
customer_reviews.text: The gimbal itself is fine, but the dirty little secret is that it is not compatible specifically with the iPhone 11 series. Neither its in house app (ZY Play) or Filmic Pro will work with this gimbal and phone combination completely.Filmic Pro will be able to do many functions but not all, while ZY Play does not have the Smooth 4 listed as compatible. A search on Google will verify this. Wish I had known before the purchase and I think Zhiyun should carry this as a banner notification. No word since the beginning of the year from them on any software update..Because of the Coronavirus situation customer support is also very very slow.
customer_reviews.author: derek rath

customer_reviews.title: Nice Handheld Gimbal, but not ready for the Android market yet!
customer_reviews.text: Nice Handheld Gimbal, but not ready for the Android market yet! App will not connect to Bluetooth and gimbals functions are NOT available for use. Works fine as a stabilizer, but all camera functions must be controlled manually. Should have been stated so in the Ad! Update: I can't explain why, but unless the App updated itself overnight. I now find the Smooth 4 fully functional and connecting to Bluetooth?.
customer_reviews.author: J. H.

customer_reviews.title: Not entirely compatible with Android, but improving.
customer_reviews.text: The device itself works good, but the app required to use it is only fully compatible iphones. Steps have been made in the right direction. Nothing really worked with the Samsung 6 active I used to have, the Note 9 is significantly better, the zoom even works.
customer_reviews.author: Novahawk9

customer_reviews.title: A complete disappointment.  A professional video editor can’t get this to work.
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment. I bought this to try to live stream our church services during the state shutdown. I’m a professional video editor and I know my way around technology. This worked for about 3 minutes and was really excited. I installed the app to try some of the integration features. Now it works for like 15 seconds, then just flops around between very brief moments of stability. Either with or without the app. Phone reset, new batteries, etc - it was a complete disaster. Was hoping I could have some control of the zoom while doing a Facebook live stream, but I didn’t even get that far. I’m returning this immediately.
customer_reviews.author: R. Weiler

customer_reviews.title: Innovative
customer_reviews.text: Have only had the smooth 4 for a couple of days, but the initial results are: very easy to use, intuitive User Interface, lots of features, and works with big iPhone (8 plus with Moment case--a little counterweight required--:-)) Very innovative!
customer_reviews.author: Philip W. Knopp

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job Amazing for the Price
customer_reviews.text: See below for Video Pros: - Great Price for a Gimbal - Can be used with many phones iPhone / Android (change the lock depending on size) - Good Material - Can be used in both portrait and landscape - Clean looking - Low Price! - Loads of buttons for usability - Comes with Case Cons: - Didn't know the case was foam - You have to learn to use it on its own - I hear the app isn't that great with Android Notes: For best recording options download Filmic Pro! ($15) For a video overview check here! ( replace (dot) with a . ) youtube (dot) com/watch?v=_fqfDN5SZQo
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bodack

customer_reviews.title: Not made for current Android devices.
customer_reviews.text: Almost zero compatibility with Pixel 3 XL. The "gimbal" went limp several times during initial use and scratched/slightly cracked the screen of my new phone. I do not recommend purchasing this if you're an Android owner. Purchase at your own risk, Android Army.
customer_reviews.author: Jshank

customer_reviews.title: Not kidding when they call it smooth.
customer_reviews.text: Really couldn't have been easier to set up and balance. I have an iPhone XS Max and it balanced fairly easy and quick. I was able to start shooting shortly after unpacking this. I love that all of the controls can be accessed from the gimbal itself rather than having to adjust much on the screen. Most of all, I really appreciate the ease of use and resources available online. I'm so new at iPhone videography that you can't even call me an amateur. Between the quick access guides included with the gimbal, resources available on Zhiyun's site, and the abundance of great tutorials available online, my experience with the Smooth 4 will only continue to get better.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Andrus

customer_reviews.title: Does nothing...
customer_reviews.text: I am returning this product. It does absolutely nothing. You turn it on, it finds the device from my phone, you can start to record but zero stabilization, and then everything just stop's working, I have to close the app. I have a Pixel 2 XL which it says it works with. This does nothing at all. I think it just came 100% broke. You turn it on it makes noise and twitches, then nothing....
customer_reviews.author: Dave J. Schlaegel

customer_reviews.title: Quite good!
customer_reviews.text: Works quite well. Controls are a bit jerky at times when moving around while walking. Sometimes it will lock on something and stay on it and not readjust to something else when I want it too, causing me to manually move it. The ability to charge the phone is a nice feature, but you have no little to no room at all to actually plug in the phone because you have to keep the phone close to the unit to keep it balanced. Quality is nice. When it works properly it is very smooth. Not overly comfortable in ones hand. The case it comes with is junk. Just styrofoam, not viable for traveling. Not many options for 3rd party accessories.
customer_reviews.author: DrDerrp

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT get if you have a google phone
customer_reviews.text: I was warned by the reviews & should have listened. This device is apparently amazing with iphones but is not good at all for google phones. I have a pixel 3 & have access to almost none of the cool features. The final straw was that I don't even have sound on my video recordings! Gonna give this to my friend who has an iphone. If anyone knows of a gimble that is good with google phones please let me know!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Gimble for $100!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Samsung Galaxy Note 9 I take it out of the case when using the Smooth 4. Stability is great. Theis Gimble is incredibly inexpensive. Software works for Android now. The app indicates you are shooting 720, I have 4k 60fps selected in the settings and it does capture at this selection. People are always stopping me to ask about the Smooth 4. I think it is a great device for a creative midlevel Filmmaker. Great for on the go Photography as well.
customer_reviews.author: Cody L. Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Take quite some time to understand the unit. Its not intuitive but seems good
customer_reviews.text: Its my second time using it. It seems that the stabilizer works welk, but using it appropriately and getting good results is not easy. The manual supplied is poor at best. The software of the app even more. The gimbal did not connect to the phone and i was almost ready to return it, and then I found that from a pie menu, u had to choose the specific model. When it comes to changing the angle floor to roof, in a previos model there was an up down button and now I find that difficult to control. Zooming with the wheel instead of hittethe screen is very helpful. Ill add more as i become more experienced
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: Constantly disconnecting.
customer_reviews.text: It's a solid physically well built item. Wish I can say the same about the software. Out of the box I fell in love with its appearance and feel up until I powered it on and connected it to my Note 8. It only stays connected for short durations of like 2 minutes then DEAD! It was fully charged and I followed all the instructions and it keeps disconnecting. I just got it on the 5th of October and I was about to return it but since I love the physical features I've decided I'd give it another shot using my wife's note 5. Hopefully I get better results.
customer_reviews.author: Eddy A.

customer_reviews.title: They don't want to talk or allow feedback
customer_reviews.text: It seems that there is no way after the sale to get a hold of anyone. My issue is simple, I upgraded to a new 20 ultra and it doesn't not fit in the holder anymore. I just wanted to know if they might be addressing this in the near future??? Simple, right? and I would be happy to upgrade my ratings but not until they put ways to contact them all over the Amazone pages. It's all about selling but when it comes to help??? Not so much...
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Folger

customer_reviews.title: Defective after 10 usage
customer_reviews.text: Within 60 days since the purchase of the Zhiyun Smooth gimbal, the orientation of the recording didn't stay in place. The phone filmed horizontally but within 2-3 minutes, the phone fell diagonally which ruined my recording. This was very inconvenient for me when I was filming something important. Much of the footage is ruined because of the gimbal is not reliable. I just took a look at the warranty. I will need to first submit a repair request and if accepted, mail the product to China. There's no information on how long repairs will take.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! The TV station I'm production manager at has used Osmos from DJI for a few years now, but those cameras haven't really been updated properly. I shoot a lot on my iPhone Xs now, and this stabilizer is fantastic. I love it so much better than the DJI smartphone stabilizer. Screw the joystick, I never used that on the DJI anyway. Have used this a lot so far, and have loved it. The battery lasts for what seems like forever. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: A. B. Balser

customer_reviews.title: Do not like this product at all. Wish i could return.
customer_reviews.text: Android, Galaxy S6 edge +.. ok, the auto focus might be limited my my phone, but it focus breathes so much the footage is unusable. The zoom is not smooth, it has noticeable click between each magnification. Put of the blue the gimbal will just give up and start pointing the camera down and then flop all over the place.. it even has correct balance. Wish I could return it..
customer_reviews.author: BRI@N

customer_reviews.title: WORKS WITH NOTE 10 PLUS
customer_reviews.text: Is verry smooth I love it I made this video with my galaxy note 10 plus And Is working properly with the software
customer_reviews.author: VDP

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work well with Android
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because it was highly rated, but after actually trying it out and then digging through more reviews, it turns out I'm having the same issue as a few others... This device is pretty glitchy with an Android device. Maybe they will come out with an update to fix this, but at this time, it's basically unusable. :( Go with something else if you are an Android user.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Lindh

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent unit once you get over the initial learning curve
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent unit once you get over the initial learning curve. The instructions are "basic" but as soon as you start using it, the advantages become clearly evident. I did have a strap made to go between the tripod and the handle as an emergency "catch all" in case it slipped out of my hand while moving. I also use it for a GoPro attaching it with rubber bands and it works very well. Highly recommended especially for the price and ease of use with my iPhone and free downloaded program.
customer_reviews.author: Robert O'Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent but fir ONE thing.
customer_reviews.text: I gave it five stars but it would be better if only it worked fully with Android. I do get this. But I feel the developers need to do the software improvements and updates to make it completely compatible with Android as it IS with IOS. I am an Android user and know how to use apple but won't but an apple iPhone just to do video with. Other than that this is a great gimbal. I like it as well as mu DJI Osmo mobile 3 even though the Osmo has a couple better features. This is as stable for my use and seems a little more robustly built.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Calibrate this right away
customer_reviews.text: This gimbal has been FANTASTIC. I've 6 videos in and the build quality + feature set is well worth the money. Right away though, download the Zhiyun app and calibrate the motors to level your phone out because they built the gimbals to handle the weight of the smaller form factor. The calibration is super easy and can be done in seconds. Then go about your business. Filmic PRO is a great app to use for this gimbal too PROS: Battery life is great. Silent motor. Quick reaction times. Manual focus/zoom pull is perfect. CONS: Motors do get hot. Plastic material is not ergonomic for long use. Gets a bit heavy after prolonged use.
customer_reviews.author: Paresh

customer_reviews.title: My First Gimbal
customer_reviews.text: The gimbal works pretty well by itself. The app leaves something to be desired. I have a Google Pixel 2 and sometimes the app has a hard time connecting to the gimbal and the zoom is super jerky. I hope the app updates will change that. Otherwise, it's a pretty amazing device for my first.
customer_reviews.author: Twyla Turner

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for use with new iPhone 11pro max
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for family trip to Disney. I can’t speak highly enough about this gimbal. My first gimbal, took a few days and YouTube videos to learn to use it for my trip. Videos are great. I used Filmic and software that came with gimbal. My only complain - the square handle - didn’t mind thickness of handed - square shape difficult to manage. Back buttons extremely useful but out of reach causing me to fumble with gimbal. Highly recommend a gimbal if you do not have one. Tripod extra benefit - using it more.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Device refuses to go into BT discovery
customer_reviews.text: Device refuses to go into BT discovery mode. I followed the instructions exactly as stated and am a very technical person. Since I can’t contact the vendor directly from the mobile app and amazon tech support was useless, I have to write this one star review. Can someone contact me immediately to explain how to get this device into BT discovery? The app refuses to connect and it's not even showing up as a BT discoverable device. And please do not just send me the same lame instructions in your manual.
customer_reviews.author: JRNYC05

customer_reviews.title: Seems fine but may have defective unit
customer_reviews.text: iPhone 8 Plus user. Looks good and clean, has excellent response. Hanging on three stars for the moment since this item may be broken. The problem: The device has a gear preservation failsafe that will turn it off if it feels too much weight. The manual and other online references advise to remove phone cases if it occurs. Doing so, as well as testing it with smaller phones, did not resolve the issue. Other 8 Plus users don't seem to have the problem so we will replace and see if it's just this unit. I will update the review once we test the replacement. Update: The problem did not resolve with replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Genuine1

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Filmic Pro on iPhone XS Max
customer_reviews.text: The product and app work very well with my iPhone XS Max. I removed my phone case and balanced the gimble as instructed and haven't had any issues (I don't use any accessories or charge the phone while filming). I did specifically purchase this product because of the video highlighting the integration with Filmic Pro... However, no one mentioned that after an update that happened a while ago, it stopped working. I can confirm that as of August 15th, 2020 it still isn't working :(
customer_reviews.author: Juan Pena

customer_reviews.title: glad i traded crane v2 for this
customer_reviews.text: i love this thing. im so glad i traded my crane v2 for the smooth 4! it's so much lighter and easier to use, plus the upgrades are totally worth it. i use my iphone 8 plus on this. the only downside is the max payload. i have to take off my screen protector and phone case to use this otherwise it would go over the max payload. i wish it was like the smooth 3 with a max payload of 260g
customer_reviews.author: Newfangled

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gimbal.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing gimbal ... works perfectly on iphone 8 but i tried using it on my S9+ and some of the feature are not working properly. Please fix the android app so that it will be perfect mobile gimbal.
customer_reviews.author: Perthnewbievlog

customer_reviews.title: Shutter sound cannot be disabled.
customer_reviews.text: You can't remove the shutter sound. Not through the system, not through the app, not even with 3rd party apps. And it cost me a job with a client. That shutter sound is incredibly loud through your phone. That is enough for me to review it with a one star. Terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for 60 days... Then no battery
customer_reviews.text: This mount worked amazing for almost 60 days. we used it almost daily taking videos and really enjoyed it. Then.... boom the battery pac quit charging. Since we are over the 30 days Amazon cannot help and the company is based in China so communicating is slow and we really don't want to send the entire unit back to get inspected and then fix and returned. May have to just buy another one, which is disappointing at best. I don't think this is common, but its happened to the only one we bought so can't add too many stars for that fact alone.
customer_reviews.author: jmoar

customer_reviews.title: Go with the Zhiyun Q2 Smooth instead. . .
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Zhiyun Smooth 4 3-Axis Handheld Gimbal Stabilizer YouTube Video Vlog Tripod for iPhone I have purchased. The other one always worked fine, this one after less than an hour began to get erratic and go limp in the middle of my shooting a wedding for a friend. I rebooted and 5 minutes later the same thing. I have the Zhiyun Q2 Smooth and it worked for 8 hours and had power to spare when I got home. Not so for Smooth 4, the battery lasted 4-5 hours vs the 12 hours it was advertised. Great company, not so great Model.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Larsen Photography

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Capability and Possibility
customer_reviews.text: Because of the Pandemic I’ve not been able to take this out for a spin. This is the only reason I’ve not given it higher marks. I’ve done the initial setup and have watched the video tutorials. Criticisms I’ve read are leading me to think my success will be tempered by how well I learn the software. Two basic choices and the operator will pick what’s best for them. It’s a lot of bang for your buck and It should be great. Watch the tutorials, ignore the whining and make it work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B

customer_reviews.title: Barely works on iPhone 11 Pro Max!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this device for my iPhone X max and shortly after I got the iPhone 11 Pro Max. On both phones the gimbal works for a few minutes then drops and you hear grinding noises. It looks like the motor cannot sustain the weight of these phones for too long. I tried my older iPhone 7 max and it worked fine, so it looks like the motor is weak. DO NOT PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.author: Christian Mougogiannis

customer_reviews.title: Smooth 4 is amazing, even for a beginner like me
customer_reviews.text: Love. Love. Love. First time gimbal user but the Smooth 4 is so easy to use. The Zhiyun play app works great with my IphoneX and i love that i can shoot videos in 4k! Watched a few tutoirals online and messed around with the gimbal for a bit to get the hang of it but everything is pretty straight forward and I felt comfortable in no time. Standby mode is legit for making battery life for my phone and the gimbal last. Tripod is money! I use it all the time. I would definitley recommend the Smooth 4 to anyone looking for a high quality gimbal.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas S Easter

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely DECEPTIVE marketing! Beware Android users.
customer_reviews.text: Such a disappointment. There is no App for Android any longer, although the reviews have not had anything positive to say. For Android users this is pretty much just a Stabilizer Handle with a bunch of useless buttons. Wish I did a little more research with the reviews. Adding insult to injury, I paid an additional $15.00 for the Filmic app they suggested and that is a flop as well. Tech and support does not respond either. Kicking this to the curb!
customer_reviews.author: Warren Pease

customer_reviews.title: My issue was picture quality, not so great
customer_reviews.text: This unit did work as stated. The gimbal function worked as described without issue. Controls didn't take too long to figure out and get very familiar with but the picture quality after the fact was very lacking. I find the iPhone takes great videos and pictures natively and after reviewed footage running through the app it was very poor quality. Also had problems with it losing connectivity to the gimbal but would only take a few seconds to reattach, still a minor annoyance.
customer_reviews.author: Tinman

customer_reviews.title: Little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I like this gimbal. But when I’m using it with iPhone X it does some odd things. Like if your aiming down to get a video of wheels or a bumper something like that, when you come up the gimbal keep last the phone pointed in an upward position. The same thing happens if you are taking a shot from above and go down low. The gimbal holds the phone, and no it’s not a static hold or program hold. It kind of moves but mostly stays in its position. In other words it doesn’t transition smoothly - Quite annoying,
customer_reviews.author: john e carrasco

customer_reviews.title: I feel like people who purchase a gimbal are the same ones ...
customer_reviews.text: The learning curve for the gimble is steeper than I expected but it functions as advertised. I’m not able to use any lenses on my iphone when using the gimbal, which is unfrotunate. I feel like people who purchase a gimbal are the same ones who want to use different lenses for their video productions so a way to do this should have been considered. I LOVE the handwheel. Was debating wether it was necssesary. It is. It makes zooming and focusing a breeze. Overall, still getting use to it but I like it.
customer_reviews.author: David Vargas

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted this to work
customer_reviews.text: Followed multiple tutorials both from the manufacturer and 3rd parties and determined that my unit was flawed. Tried both Pano modes and...nothing. Motion Time Lapse would work for anything up to 1 minute. Anything beyond 1 minute would just collapse the gimbal during recording. Using an iPhone XS. I didn't feel like dealing with the hassle of returning the unit for a replacement in fear I'd be dealing with this all over again so I'm returning for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Matt N.

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing on a Samsung S10+ until my trip to Irelan
customer_reviews.text: Just got my Smooth 4 and installed it with my 10s+. I don't know what everyone is talking about problems on Android because the setup is very straight forward and everything is working great. Had to spend about 2 hours learning about all of the neat features and there are many and WOW... the effects are amazing. Totally satisfied. Edit: It was working great until I took it on my trip to Ireland which was the whole reason I bought it. It was packed inside my suitcase so there's no way it got damaged in transit. When I tried to use it I got the red light of death. Total crap!
customer_reviews.author: Clarkek

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This gimbal COULD be amazing. But it just doesn't seem to be ready for prime time. The device itself is amazing. So much potential to this thing if they can get it work with Android phones. I read many reviews warning Android users of the problems. I should have listened. I spend a couple hours fighting the app to shoot some Christmas scenery only to find out that all of the footage was useless. Instead of video footage I ended up with still video. I reset my phone, reinstalled the app and reloaded the current firmware, but nothing fixed the problems. I really wanted this to work. My phone is a Samsung Galaxy S7.
customer_reviews.author: K0PIE

customer_reviews.title: Not for iPhone pro max
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to use the gimbal for my iPhone 11 Pro Max but you have to get counter weights and with the added weight the gimbal struggles to preform normally. I even downloaded the latest firmware and it didn’t help with the gimbal powering off due to my phone being too heavy. Works perfect for any lighter smaller phone. I wish I could just get a refund and return it until they come out with a stronger motor or gimbal all together
customer_reviews.author: Ching684

customer_reviews.title: Amazing on iPhone with one issue
customer_reviews.text: Great gadget! I'm amazed how well it works. They app (for iPhone at least) is amazing. I use it over the $35 app I already had on my phone. So why 4/5? They said you can charge your phone while you use it, but it doesn't come with the special cable you need. On top of that the only place that sells them charges $30 for 3 cheap looking cables and they have to come all the way from China!! Huge bummer. They could have easily throw one into the packaging. It's almost worth returning to getting a different gimble that you can charge on.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Drach

customer_reviews.title: Battery doesn't last and can't follow objects. User experience is terrible.
customer_reviews.text: This product has issues working with bigger phones like Google pixel 4 xl. It has trouble following objects and the battery doesn't last at all. I charged the smooth 4 one night, didn't use it the next day, turned it on day after and the battery was at 29%. It worked just fine the first couple of weeks when we bought it and then the quality has just deteriorated since. It doesn't age well. Can't get a refund or return it either. The user experience sucks too. You can't turn the camera unless you move the entire stick. There is no option to rotate the swivel the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jakiul Alam

customer_reviews.title: Very Smooth
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time owning a gimbal and after reading tons of reviews I decided to get the Zhiyun Smooth 4. The Smooth 4 is nothing short of awesome. The battery life is great and lasts hours. Although it drains my iphone7's battery quickly, Zhiyun will send you a charger that connects your phone to the gimbal for free if you message them. I've been shooting in 4k and the cinematic effects are satisfying. The slow mo option makes your videos look like a movie trailer. I'm still getting used to using other functions while filming, but they are relatively simple and straightforward. For its price, definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: victor chong

The gimbal itself is well designed and has a multitude of buttons and knobs that enhance the experience and ease of use. My favorite feature is the subject tracking mode. It follows me perfectly as I'm making workout videos with it. I'm very pleased with this purchase!

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality, stabilization and a fair price.
customer_reviews.text: Great build quality and controls. Very impressed with the smoothness of the focus pull. The active tracking can use some improvement but for most purposes will work well. The ZY Play app integrates really well with the stabilizer and had no issues connecting or using any of its features. It would be great to include a counterweight or allow a little longer bracket for balancing larger phones with a case, however it works well with my iPhone 8 Plus without the case. Overall the Smooth 4 is a very smooth gimbal with great stabilization, especially for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Limited functionality with Android

It should really state that the only function available for Android users is the zoom wheel. It won't take a picture, start a video, or really do anything other than zoom using the handheld controls. Everything works, but you'll have to use your phones touch screen to do pretty much everything.

product_meta.title: Zhiyun Smooth 4 3-Axis Handheld Gimbal Stabilizer YouTube Video Vlog Tripod for iPhone 11 Pro Xs Max Xr X 8 Plus 7 6 SE Android Cell Phone Smartphone
product_meta.description:
Color:Black

Overview:
Zhiyun Smooth 4 is Born for Mobile Filmmakers, turns your mobile phone into a professional filmmaking camera, helping you create stable and smooth footage with just your phone. Get one now to create your own Hollywood movies with just phones!

Features:
Integrated control panel design: reduce the need to touch the screen, and help users control both the stabilizer and mobile camera directly with hot-key buttons.
Focus Pull & Zoom Capability: with the professional and delicated handwheel you can zoom in or out as you want to take close-up shots; By pressing the FN switch button, the handwheel is configured into a focus puller, helping you achieve high-precision focus changes in real time.
PhoneGo Mode for Instant Scene Transition: release the potential of motors in a flash to respond to every delicate movement without delay.
Time Lapse Expert: It can realize features such as Timelapse, moving time lapse and Motionlapse, recording lives and displaying the art of time flow.
Object Tracking: You can frame the object you want to track on the screen, and the stabilizer can do the rest.
Two-way Charging with Longer Runtime: Smooth 4 can run for 12 hours in a row. It adopts the mainstream Type-C charging port, smooth 4 can be charged by portable power source and the phone can be charged by the stabilizer via USB port on tilt axis.
Always powerful and compatible to all phones: The motor power of Smooth 4 has increased by a large extent, making it compatible to phones of all sizes.

EACHSHOT Cleaning Cloth: Ultra gentle! Safe for all surfaces and lenses.

Package Including:
1x Zhiyun Smooth 4
1x Charging Cable
1x Tripod

Warm Tips:
Please install the camera or smartphone before powering on the gimbal. It WON'T work if not putting anything on it.
feature_bullets: 👍👍【Filmic Pro】The official APP for Smooth 4 is called ZY play. But Filmic Pro has best in class support for Smooth 4, you can use Filmic Pro as an alternative to ZY play.
👍👍【Control Panel】Integrated control panel design,Focus Pull & Zoom Capability

✅✅【MUST KNOW】Balance the gimbal before use: Slide the smartphoone in as close as possible to against the tilt axis motor. Loosen the Roll (Y) Axis Thumb Screw (which is on the back) to adjust the gravity center by sliding the horizontal arm.When phone stays in level in power OFF status, it is balanced.We recommend you VIEW the video tutorials, There are lots of tutorial videos on YOUTUBE that will help you master the gimbal.
👍👍【PhoneGo Mode】PhoneGo Mode for Instant Scene Transition
👍👍【Time Lapse & Object Tracking】Time Lapse Expert and Object Tracking available, Supports Two-way Charging with Longer Runtime
